sentences.sentence: I always read my horoscope and follow the advice.
sentences.translation: 我总是查我的星象，然后依照其建议行事。

sentences.sentence: I did my — I got my horoscope for today on the web.
sentences.translation: 我今天在网上看了自己的星座运程。

sentences.sentence: The prefix in the word horoscope is also from Greek.
